VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Whispering Willows Estate relative to Sunstone Farms?
SRP.A: Whispering Willows Estate is {above} Sunstone Farms in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Sunstone Farms}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ironwood Ranch}.

VE.A: Sunstone Farms's crop yield in 2014 is {373258.64} tons/hectare.

VE.Q: What is Ironwood Ranch's Crop Yield in 2003?
VE.A: Ironwood Ranch's crop yield in 2003 is {87181.10} tons/hectare.

VE.Q: What is Whispering Willows Estate's Crop Yield in 2012?
VE.A: Whispering Willows Estate's crop yield in 2012 is {161919.10} tons/hectare.

VE.Q: What are the crop yield of Ironwood Ranch, Sunstone Farms, and Whispering Willows Estate in 2008?
VE.A: Ironwood Ranch's crop yield is {75066.27} tons/hectare, Sunstone Farms's crop yield is {211169.65} tons/hectare, Whispering Willows Estate's crop yield is {139638.52} tons/hectare.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Crop Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum crop yield is {48966.32} tons/hectare.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Crop Yield in the area chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Crop Yield level recorded for Ironwood Ranch?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Ranch reached approximately {99101.38} tons/hectare in {2000}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Crop Yield level recorded for Ironwood Ranch?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Ranch's lowest recorded level is approximately {48966.32} tons/hectare in {2016}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Crop Yield?
SC.A: The average total crop yield is {453691.36} tons/hectare.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Crop Yield fall between 418510.58 and 462564.32 tons/hectare? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Crop Yield exceed 515836.85 tons/hectare? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {599643.53} tons/hectare in {2014}, {641276.37} tons/hectare in {2015}, {538272.21} tons/hectare in {2012}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Crop Yield go below 365238.05 tons/hectare? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {359348.35} tons/hectare in {2004}, {294487.98} tons/hectare in {2000}, {337035.71} tons/hectare in {2003}.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 2001 higher or lower than in 2009?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 2001 was {lower} than in 2009.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 2015 higher or lower than in 2016?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 2015 was {lower} than in 2016.

NC.Q: Between 2009 and 2013, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 2004 and 2012?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 2009 and 2013 was {higher} than between 2004 and 2012.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2011, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 2015 and 2016?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 2000 and 2011 was {lower} than between 2015 and 2016.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Sunstone Farms} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Ironwood Ranch, Whispering Willows Estate, Sunstone Farms}.
